::Repressor::

About to answer Lady Hawk when Najah spoke up, Repressor sighs, 
sitting down, with his missile launcher still aimed at Lady Hawk. He 
was stuck in a shuttle with some pompous pain in the skid plate, and 
a bot with a lisp, who apperently didn't mind being blown up.

He puts away his missile launcher, taking out a rifle instead.

"Allright, a rifle shot wouldn't kill us all," he says, aiming the 
rifle at Lady Hawk's head. He knew she could throw Najah into the 
shot, and he wasn't about to shoot, "And if you don't be quiet, I'm 
going to take your head to Zardus, dragging your body behind me."




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
wrote:
> Najah::
> 
> "Yesss yessss" said happily the snake "Tht would be 
glouriosssss.... 
> we blowing up in piecessssss"

> > Lady Hawk laughs at Repressors statement. "And your mentality is 
> > likely to offline us all." she knew what would happen if he fired 
a 
> > missle in such small quarters. "Your missle would destroy the 
> control 
> > system in this shuttle and send us all plumetting to our ends. 
> except 
> > that the missle would have destroyed Najah and I first."
